main event: Multiple witnesses observed unidentified flying objects over Dayton, Ohio, including a stationary object and various bright lights in the sky.
interesting points: One witness reported seeing a bright light that appeared to hover and flash while gradually fading from view., Another sighting involved observations of two blue-white pulsating lights that changed brightness and direction., The reports contained detailed questionnaires and were part of Project Blue Book investigations., Witnesses cited similar recent sightings suggesting possible recurring phenomena in the area., The duration of the sighting ranged from 1 minute to approximately 30 minutes.
sighted object: bright light and various unidentified flying objects
witness description: Witnesses reported seeing bright lights and objects in the sky with various behaviors.
